description:
FEATURES
- 5 beautiful scenes to explore
- 8 different vehicles
- Singleplayer mode against AI opponents
- 2 player split-screen game mode
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic physics simulation
- Easy to learn controls
name: Playroom Racer
intro:
Small cars, big fun!
Playroom Racer is a 3D toy car racer for all ages.
